track.name: My Adidas
comments: Love Run DMC
rip jam master jay......
lincredible: Are you sure?
brings back fond memories of Tony Hawk Pro Skater 4..
This was my song! I had this on cassette tape and vinyl!  Yes I said vinyl :)  Even my dad, who was a classic jazz lover, loved Run DMC!  RIP Jay and to my dad! <3
Run DMC High School Daze Damn Was I EVER that young?
what was great was they didn't do this as a corporate advertising stunt like all the bullshit that goes on today.
Rocking my shell-toes as we speak!
Kin A !!
and another 'i-grew-up-with-their music'-band...icons.
wolverines doing thier thing in adidas! GO BLUE!
OK  --- I run in asics... but... this song rocks a marathon training run....
Chillin Cali...
///... ace brand
3 Stripes...
The kings put adidas on the map.
Run-D.M.C - My Adidas
we travel on gravel, dirt road or street <-- best rhyme in ages.
In middle school everyone knew what ADIDAS meant! LOL  All Day I Dream About Sex! WOO HOO!!!  Ok..early 80's and very impressionable and young!
I am not a real fan of "Rap Music" but RUN DMC had it!!!!
